datamap-desc: Allows embedding of interactive maps into wiki pages.
datamap-doc-page-does-not-exist: ''Documentation for this map may be created at [[$1]]''
datamap-category-pages-including-broken-: Pages including data maps failing validation
datamap-mapsrcinfo-internal-page: This page contains source code of a map. It is not meant to be visited directly, and will not show up in web search engines. Instead, it should be embedded in an article.
datamap-mapsrcinfo-status-ok: No issues found in this map's source code.
datamap-mapsrcinfo-status-meh: Minor issues found in this map's source code.
datamap-mapsrcinfo-status-errors: This map does not pass source code validation.
datamap-mapsrcinfo-docslink: You may consult the [$1 extension's documentation] if needed, or [$2 create an issue report or feature request ticket] if you think things need some changes.
datamap-error-validate-invalid-json: This is not a valid JSON document.
datamap-validate-bad-schema: This map's $schema property does not point at a supported format definition. Supported schema revisions: $1
datamap-validate-constraint-type: A property is of unexpected format: $1.
datamap-validate-constraint-regex: Text property does not match the expected format: $1.
datamap-validate-constraint-empty: Text property must not be empty: $1.
datamap-validate-constraint-minlength: Text property must consist of at least $2 characters: $1.
datamap-validate-constraint-minimum: Numeric property's value must be higher than $2: $1.
datamap-validate-constraint-maximum: Numeric property's value must be lower than $2: $1.
datamap-validate-constraint-fallback: An unknown error occured while validating property: $1. Please [$2 report this problem] to the developers.
datamap-validate-constraint-notcollectib: The following properties in group $1 have no effect because it is not collectible: $2.
datamap-validate-constraint-searchdisabl: The following properties in $1 have no effect because marker search is not enabled: $2.
datamap-validate-constraint-requiredfile: The following files are referenced but do not exist: $1
datamap-validate-constraint-muidoverlap: Marker found with an identifier already used: $1 (UID is $2).
datamap-validate-constraint-groupexists: Group referenced for marker list $1 but does not exist: $2.
datamap-validate-constraint-bglayerexist: Background layer(s) referenced for marker list $1 but not declared: $2.
datamap-validate-constraint-layerdeclove: Groups and categories cannot share names: $1, $2.
datamap-validate-constraint-assocgroupov: Only one group may be specified for a marker list $1, found: $2.
datamap-validate-constraint-assocnonuniq: A group or a category has been specified more than once for marker list $1.
datamap-validate-constraint-deprecated-i: Property $3 was deprecated in schema revision $1 and will no longer be supported in $2. Use property $4 instead.
datamap-validate-constraint-deprecated-n: Property $3 was deprecated in schema revision $1 and will no longer be supported in $2. No alternatives are available.
datamap-error-validatespec-map-bad-mixin: Fragment page "$1" must exist, use the Interactive Data Map content model, and be valid syntax- and structure-wise.
datamap-error-validatespec-map-mixin-wit: Other fragments may not be referenced in a fragment.
datamap-error-render-unsupported-display: Display mode $1 has been reported for a marker, but support is missing for it. This is a bug in the extension's code.
datamap-error-pf-page-does-not-exist: Data map page "[[$1]]" does not exist.
datamap-error-pf-page-invalid-content-mo: Content model of page "[[$1]]" is not Interactive Data Map.
datamap-error-pf-max-width-invalid: Maximum width of the map embed must be an integer greater than zero.
datamap-error-map-validation-fail: The [[$1|data map's source code]] no longer passes data validation. Please fix the errors.
datamap-javascript-required: JavaScript must be enabled for this map to work. If you do not see it below, it probably means you have JavaScript disabled.
datamap-error-dataload:
Couldn't load data
please refresh or try again later
datamap-lazy-click-to-load: Click to load the data map
datamap-checklist-prelude: These are the items you can mark as collected:
datamap-interact-touch: Use two fingers to move the map
datamap-interact-scroll: Use CTRL + Scroll to zoom the map
datamap-interact-scroll-mac: Use ⌘ + Scroll to zoom the map
datamap-control-toggle-legend: Tap to expand the legend to toggle markers
datamap-control-centre-view: Center view at current zoom level
